TopicTitle: The Adventures of The KSS Kerbalprise

Articles.Content:
Hello all and welcome to my first real attempt at getting a reusable spacecraft. My intent was to go to and from either or both moons and return safely to a Kerbin orbit all on one tank of fuel. It also had to have a lander and had to carry a probe for deployment. I fit both into a double long cargo bay with a little room to spare!

Here's it when it is fully loaded... By the way it holds a maximum of 9 crew members (8 if you dont want to occupy the small lander when you dock it).

The lander runs entirely on RCS engines, and it still packs quite a punch. The probe runs on Xenon gas; it surprisingly has a lot of thrust as well.

Anyways, More to come, such as... How the hell did I get this thing into space? I'll show the whole launch process later

This isn't a request... and isn't a company... soo...

Off to the Spacecraft Exchange with ye!
Ah geez you're right. Sorry it's my first post in this forum
It looks amazing. Would you be willing to post a craft file for it?
